department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: GPS/GNSS掩星觀測與地面中高頻雷達(the ground-based MF/HF Radar)應用於電離層遙測的訊號處理
goal.en: the VIPIR (a MF/HF radar), COSMIC, and COSMIC2 data collection, analyses, and applications.

outline.ch: 本課程是針對GPS/GNSS掩星觀測與地面中高頻雷達(the ground-based MF/HF Radar)應用於電離層遙測的訊號處理而設計的，內容包含基本電離層理論介紹，GPS掩星觀測原理，中高頻雷達系統遙測原理，系統發射及接收天線陣列設計，發射訊號型式設計，及電離層探回波訊號處理、自動化電離圖判讀電離層參數、電離層電子密度實高分析、電離層電子密度模式建立等都一一說明，另含重要相關論文研討。
outline.en: This course is designed for graduated students. The course objectives include the VIPIR (a MF/HF radar), COSMIC, and COSMIC2 data collection, analyses, and applications. The course contents include (1) an introduction on ionosphere and basic ionospheric theory, (2) radio wave propagation in the ionosphere, (3) ground-based ionospheric sounding technique, (4) radio occultation sounding technique, (5) VIPIR and COSMIC/COSMIC2 data collection, (6) ionogram and autoscaling, (7) ioospheric electron density modeling, etc.

textbook.ch: 指定教材：上課筆記 (lectures ＆ notes) 參 考 書(Reference books)： 1. VIPIR manual (動態式電離層探測儀技術手冊與操作軟體手冊)。 2. Ionospheric Radio, Kenneth Davies, Peter Peregrinus Ltd., London, United Kingtom, 1990 3. Radio Techniques for Probing the Terrestrial Ionosphere, R. D. Hunsucker, Springer-Verlag. Berlin Heidelberg, New York, 1991.
textbook.en: Lectures ＆ notes Reference books： 1. VIPIR manual 2. Ionospheric Radio, Kenneth Davies, Peter Peregrinus Ltd., London, United Kingtom, 1990 3. Radio Techniques for Probing the Terrestrial Ionosphere, R. D. Hunsucker, Springer-Verlag. Berlin Heidelberg, New York, 1991.

gradMethod.ch: 學生成績以實際資料分析，繳交期中與期末報告為主，無期中考、期末考。
gradMethod.en: reports (100％), i.e., no mid-term and final.

flexDiscription.ch: In-campus or out-of-campus workshop and/or conference
flexDiscription.en: In-campus or out-of-campus workshop and/or conference

en.competencies: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics
